li.a: News Release - Are you Eligible for Free and Reduced Meals

em.span: Meals are available for anyone 18 years old and younger.

p.span: If you would like meals during this time of uncertainty,
please call us at the school office (509)445-1125
We will add you to our list and provide further instructions.

div.strong: Cusick School District #59 serves 235 students in grades K-12. We are located in an extremely beautiful area of Pend Oreille County in the northeast corner of Washington State. We are 50 miles north of Spokane and 18 miles from Newport. Cusick serves students from the nearby Kalispel Indian Reservation and the communities of Cusick and Usk.

span.strong: Bess Herian Elementary: 8:15 a.m. to 3:35 p.m.

span.span: Click our 'EMPLOYMENT' Link for Open Teaching Positions

span.em: Click 'Student Supply List' Under the District tab for the new list!

span.span: Cusick School District does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. Please see the Nondiscrimination Statement link to view the employees who have been designated to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination.
